oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Der Typus Ebert - Anmerkungen zur Biografie des Parteiführers im Staatsamt der Weimarer Republik
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mühlhausen, Walter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Biographie
Friedrich Ebert
Weimarer Republik
Sozialdemokratie
Biography
Weimar Republic
Social Democracy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Based on the "Ebert generation", which includes those roughly born between 1861 and 1884, the author characterizes the "Ebert type" among social democratic politicians. He concentrates on social democrats in prominent governmental positions during the Weimar era and highlights features specific for this generation whilst not ignoring the importance of individual characteristics of these social democratic "executive elite". The author argues that this generational approach has important consequences for research on individual and collective biographies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Moving the Social; Vol. 45 (2011): Biografische Ansätze zur Geschichte der Arbeiterbewegung im 20. Jahrhundert; 99-118
